parameters.content:
## ü§ñ AI Financial Analyst Workflow

**What this does:**
This workflow creates an intelligent financial analyst agent that:
- Receives user queries via webhook
- Performs real-time internet research 
- Provides comprehensive financial analysis
- Maintains conversation memory
- Returns professional investment insights

**Perfect for:** Stock analysis, market research, investment decisions, economic trends

---

üìö **Want to build more AI agents?**  
[Learn ML System Design ‚Üí](https://maven.com/boring-bot/ml-system-design)

üíª **Get the source code:**  
[GitHub: Agents in Action ‚Üí](https://github.com/traversaal-ai/agents-in-action)

## üéØ AI Agent Core

**The Brain:** Expert financial analyst with:
- Market knowledge
- Economic trend analysis
- Investment strategy expertise

Uses advanced prompt engineering for:
- Query breakdown
- Research strategy
- Professional analysis framework

---

üöÄ **Master AI Agent Development:**  
[Take the Course ‚Üí](https://maven.com/boring-bot/ml-system-design)

## üß† GPT-4o Mini

**Language Model:**
- Cost-effective OpenAI model
- Fast response times
- Great for financial analysis
- Handles complex reasoning

**Pro Tip:** Upgrade to GPT-4 for even more detailed analysis!

---

üìñ **Learn model selection strategies:**  
[GitHub Examples ‚Üí](https://github.com/traversaal-ai/agents-in-action)

## üí≠ Conversation Memory

**Features:**
- Remembers chat history
- User-specific sessions
- Context-aware responses
- Follow-up questions work!

**Session Key:** Uses username for personalized experience

---

üîß **Explore memory patterns:**  
[GitHub: Memory Systems ‚Üí](https://github.com/traversaal-ai/agents-in-action)

## üåê Real-Time Research

**Internet Search Tool:**
- Live market data access
- Latest financial news
- Company earnings reports
- Economic indicators

**API:** Traversaal ARES engine for accurate, up-to-date information

---

‚ö° **Build your own search tools:**  
[Course: Tool Integration ‚Üí](https://maven.com/boring-bot/ml-system-design)

## üì• Webhook Input

**Receives:**
- username
- query

**Trigger:** POST requests from chatbot or external apps

**Endpoint:** Ready for integration!

---

üîó **API Integration Patterns:**  
[GitHub Examples ‚Üí](https://github.com/traversaal-ai/agents-in-action)

## üì§ Response Output

**Returns:**

- Actionable insights
- Data-driven recommendations

**Format:** Clean text ready for display

---

üìä **Response Optimization:**  
[Learn More ‚Üí](https://maven.com/boring-bot/ml-system-design)

parameters.text:
=You are an expert financial analyst and investment advisor with deep knowledge of global markets, economic trends, and financial instruments.

User Query: {{ $json.body.query }}
Current Date/Time: {{ $now }}
Current Year: 2025

## Your Mission:
Provide a comprehensive, data-driven financial analysis for the user's query by leveraging real-time market information and economic data.

## Research Strategy:
1. **Break down the user's query** into 2-4 focused research questions that will provide the most valuable financial insights
2. **Use the search tool strategically** - each search should target specific, current financial data
3. **Prioritize recent information** - focus on 2024-2025 data, quarterly reports, and latest market developments

## Search Query Guidelines:
- Include specific timeframes (e.g., "2024 Q4", "latest", "current")
- Target authoritative financial sources (Bloomberg, Reuters, SEC filings, earnings reports)
- Search for both fundamental data (financials, ratios) and technical indicators when relevant
- Look for expert analyst opinions and institutional research

## Analysis Framework:
After gathering data, structure your response to include:
- **Executive Summary** - Key findings and recommendations
- **Current Market Position** - Latest price/valuation data with context
- **Financial Health Analysis** - Key metrics, ratios, and performance indicators  
- **Risk Assessment** - Potential upside/downside factors
- **Market Context** - How broader economic conditions affect this investment
- **Actionable Insights** - Specific, practical recommendations with reasoning

## Response Quality Standards:
- Cite specific data points with approximate dates
- Quantify your analysis with numbers, percentages, and comparisons
- Acknowledge any limitations in available data
- Use professional financial terminology appropriately
- Provide balanced perspective showing multiple viewpoints when relevant

Remember: Your goal is to deliver institutional-quality financial analysis that helps the user make informed decisions based on the most current available information.
